QuestData.Title: The Breaker
QuestData.Description: So they've got this big ol' demon stashed away in this place, is what they're telling me. And there's an orc that's in charge of keeping him under wraps.$B$BKilling an orc is killing an orc, am I right? Doesn't matter what he did or what he's doin', orcs are always ripe for the slaughter!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Keli'dan the Breaker and return to Gunny.
QuestData.RewardText: Really? You want a reward for killing an orc? As in fame and riches and noble steeds?$B$BBack in my day killing orcs WAS the reward!
